chunk:
[Hypertension] is the name of a kind of disease.
[Hypertension] presents the symptom [Albuminuria].
[Hypertension] presents the symptom [Angina Pectoris].
[Hypertension] presents the symptom [Anoxia].
[Hypertension] presents the symptom [Birth Weight].
[Hypertension] presents the symptom [Body Weight].
[Hypertension] presents the symptom [Cardiac Output, Low].
[Hypertension] presents the symptom [Decerebrate State].
[Hypertension] presents the symptom [Dizziness].
[Hypertension] presents the symptom [Edema].
[Hypertension] presents the symptom [Eye Manifestations].
[Hypertension] localizes at the [Parasympathetic Nervous System] of human body.
[Hypertension] localizes at the [Sympathetic Nervous System] of human body.
[Hypertension] localizes at the [Heart] of human body.
[Hypertension] localizes at the [Vas Deferens] of human body.
[Hypertension] localizes at the [Central Nervous System] of human body.
[Hypertension] localizes at the [Urine] of human body.
[Hypertension] localizes at the [Smooth Muscle Tissue] of human body.
[Hypertension] localizes at the [Renal Vein] of human body.
[Hypertension] localizes at the [Superior Mesenteric Artery] of human body.
[Hypertension] localizes at the [Renal Artery] of human body.

The following content describes information about compounds that can palliate or treat the disease named Hypertension.The format of each compound's information is as follows:
Compound name: ***
Pharmacologic class: ***
Effect on Hypertension: Palliate or Treat
Side effect: ***
These respectively represent the name of the compound, the pharmacologic class it belongs to, its positive effect on the disease named Hypertension (palliates or treats) and its side effects.

Compound name: Phentolamine
Pharmacologic class: None
Effect on Hypertension: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Angina pectoris, Arrhythmia, Asthenia, Chest pain, Diarrhoea, Dizziness, Flushing, Gastrointestinal disorder, Headache

Compound name: Diazoxide
Pharmacologic class: None
Effect on Hypertension: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Albuminuria, Anorexia, Anxiety, Asthenia, Chest pain, Conjunctival haemorrhage, Dermatitis, Diabetic ketoacidosis, Diarrhoea

Compound name: Reserpine
Pharmacologic class: Decreased Sympathetic Activity
Effect on Hypertension: Treat
Side effect: Angina pectoris, Anorexia, Anxiety, Arrhythmia, Deafness, Libido decreased, Dermatitis, Diarrhoea, Dizziness, Drowsiness

Compound name: Pindolol
Pharmacologic class: None
Effect on Hypertension: Treat
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Aggression, Anxiety, Arthralgia, Asthenia, Atrioventricular block, Mental disorder, Bronchospasm, Chest pain, Confusional state

Compound name: Indapamide
Pharmacologic class: Increased Diuresis
Effect on Hypertension: Treat
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Agranulocytosis, Amblyopia, Amnesia, Anaphylactic shock, Anaemia, Aplastic anaemia, Haemolytic anaemia, Angina pectoris, Angioedema

Compound name: Bepridil
Pharmacologic class: None
Effect on Hypertension: Treat
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Angina pectoris, Anorexia, Anxiety, Arrhythmia, Arthritis, Asthenia, Constipation, Cough, Sudden death

Compound name: Hydralazine
Pharmacologic class: Arteriolar Vasodilation
Effect on Hypertension: Treat
Side effect: Agranulocytosis, Anaemia, Haemolytic anaemia, Angina pectoris, Anorexia, Anxiety, Arthralgia, Pleuritic pain, Conjunctivitis, Constipation

Compound name: Nisoldipine
Pharmacologic class: Calcium Channel Antagonists
Effect on Hypertension: Treat
Side effect: Alopecia, Amblyopia, Amnesia, Anaemia, Angioedema, Anorexia, Anxiety, Arthralgia, Arthritis, Asthma

Compound name: Felodipine
Pharmacologic class: Calcium Channel Antagonists
Effect on Hypertension: Treat
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Anaemia, Angina pectoris, Angioedema, Anxiety disorder, Arrhythmia, Arthralgia, Asthenia, Back pain, Bronchitis

Compound name: Irbesartan
Pharmacologic class: Angiotensin 2 Receptor Antagonists
Effect on Hypertension: Treat
Side effect: Abdominal distension, Abdominal pain, Agranulocytosis, Anaphylactic shock, Anaemia, Aplastic anaemia, Haemolytic anaemia, Angina pectoris, Angioedema, Anorexia

Compound name: Guanethidine
Pharmacologic class: None
Effect on Hypertension: Treat
Side effect: 

Compound name: Isradipine

entities.name: HYPERTENSION
entities.description: Hypertension is a disease characterized by high blood pressure and presents various symptoms affecting multiple systems in the body.

entities.name: ALBUMINURIA
entities.description: Albuminuria is a symptom of hypertension where there is an excess of albumin in the urine, indicating kidney issues.

entities.name: ANGINA PECTORIS
entities.description:
Angina Pectoris is a symptom of hypertension that manifests as chest pain due to reduced blood flow to the heart.
Angina Pectoris is a symptom of hypertension that involves chest pain due to reduced blood flow to the heart.

entities.name: ANOXIA
entities.description:
Anoxia is a symptom of hypertension characterized by a deficiency of oxygen reaching the tissues.
Anoxia is a symptom of hypertension defined by a deficiency of oxygen reaching the tissues, which can lead to serious health issues.

entities.name: BIRTH WEIGHT
entities.description:
Birth Weight is a health indicator that can be affected by hypertension during pregnancy, potentially leading to complications for the newborn.
Birth Weight is a symptom of hypertension that can indicate potential health issues in newborns.

entities.name: BODY WEIGHT
entities.description:
Body Weight is a symptom of hypertension that can be affected by the disease and its treatment.
Body Weight is a measurable attribute that can be influenced by hypertension and its treatment, affecting overall health.

entities.name: CARDIAC OUTPUT, LOW
entities.description:
Low Cardiac Output is a symptom of hypertension indicating insufficient blood flow from the heart.
Low Cardiac Output is a condition that can arise from hypertension, indicating insufficient blood flow from the heart to meet the body's needs.

entities.name: DECEREBRATE STATE
entities.description:
Decerebrate State is a severe symptom of hypertension indicating brain dysfunction.
Decerebrate State is a severe neurological condition that can occur as a result of complications from hypertension.

entities.name: DIZZINESS
entities.description:
Dizziness is a common symptom of hypertension that can affect balance and coordination.
Dizziness is a common symptom associated with hypertension, affecting balance and coordination.

entities.name: EDEMA
entities.description:
Edema is a condition characterized by swelling due to excess fluid retention, often associated with hypertension.
Edema is a symptom of hypertension characterized by swelling due to excess fluid in the body's tissues.

entities.name: EYE MANIFESTATIONS
entities.description:
Eye Manifestations are symptoms of hypertension that can affect vision and eye health.
Eye Manifestations refer to various visual symptoms that can occur as a result of hypertension, affecting eye health.

entities.name: PARASYMPATHETIC NERVOUS SYSTEM
entities.description:
The Parasympathetic Nervous System is a part of the autonomic nervous system where hypertension can have localized effects, influencing bodily functions.
The Parasympathetic Nervous System is a part of the body where hypertension can localize, affecting bodily functions.

entities.name: SYMPATHETIC NERVOUS SYSTEM
entities.description:
The Sympathetic Nervous System is another component of the autonomic nervous system where hypertension can localize, affecting stress responses and heart rate.
The Sympathetic Nervous System is another area where hypertension can localize, influencing stress responses.

entities.name: HEART
entities.description:
The Heart is a vital organ where hypertension can localize, impacting its function and overall cardiovascular health.
The Heart is a vital organ where hypertension can localize, impacting its function and health.

entities.name: VAS DEFERENS
entities.description:
The Vas Deferens is a duct in the male reproductive system where hypertension can localize, potentially affecting reproductive health.
The Vas Deferens is a part of the male reproductive system where hypertension can localize, potentially affecting fertility.

entities.name: CENTRAL NERVOUS SYSTEM
entities.description:
The Central Nervous System is a critical area where hypertension can localize, affecting brain function.
The Central Nervous System is a critical area where hypertension can localize, affecting cognitive and motor functions.

entities.name: URINE
entities.description:
Urine is a bodily fluid where hypertension can localize, often analyzed for health indicators.
Urine is a bodily fluid that can be analyzed for indicators of hypertension, reflecting kidney function and overall health.

entities.name: SMOOTH MUSCLE TISSUE
entities.description:
Smooth Muscle Tissue is a type of muscle tissue where hypertension can localize, affecting various organ functions and blood vessel tone.
Smooth Muscle Tissue is a type of tissue where hypertension can localize, affecting various organ functions.

entities.name: RENAL VEIN
entities.description:
The Renal Vein is a blood vessel that drains blood from the kidneys, where hypertension can have significant effects on kidney health.
The Renal Vein is a blood vessel where hypertension can localize, impacting kidney function.

entities.name: SUPERIOR MESENTERIC ARTERY
entities.description:
The Superior Mesenteric Artery supplies blood to the intestines, and hypertension can affect its function and blood flow.
The Superior Mesenteric Artery is a major blood vessel where hypertension can localize, affecting blood flow to the intestines.

entities.name: RENAL ARTERY
entities.description:
The Renal Artery supplies blood to the kidneys, and hypertension can impact its function, leading to renal complications.)<|COMPLETE|>
The Renal Artery is a blood vessel where hypertension can localize, influencing kidney health.

entities.name: PHENTOLAMINE
entities.description: Phentolamine is a compound that can palliate hypertension but has various side effects including abdominal pain and dizziness.

entities.name: DIAZOXIDE
entities.description: Diazoxide is a compound that can palliate hypertension and has side effects such as abdominal pain and anxiety.

entities.name: RESERPINE
entities.description: Reserpine is a compound that treats hypertension and may cause side effects like angina pectoris and dizziness.

entities.name: PINDOLOL
entities.description: Pindolol is a compound that treats hypertension with side effects including chest pain and anxiety.

entities.name: INDAPAMIDE
entities.description: Indapamide is a compound that treats hypertension and can cause side effects like angina pectoris and anaphylactic shock.

entities.name: BEPRIDIL
entities.description: Bepridil is a compound that treats hypertension and has side effects such as anxiety and chest pain.

entities.name: HYDRALAZINE
entities.description: Hydralazine is a compound that treats hypertension and may cause side effects like anemia and anxiety.

entities.name: NISOLDIPINE
entities.description: Nisoldipine is a compound that treats hypertension with side effects including angioedema and anxiety.

entities.name: FELODIPINE
entities.description: Felodipine is a compound that treats hypertension and can cause side effects like angina pectoris and anxiety disorder.

entities.name: IRBESARTAN
entities.description: Irbesartan is a compound that treats hypertension and has side effects such as abdominal pain and angioedema.

entities.name: GUANETHIDINE
entities.description: Guanethidine is a compound that treats hypertension but lacks detailed side effect information.

entities.name: ISRADIPINE
entities.description: Isradipine is a compound that treats hypertension, though specific side effects are not detailed in the text.

entities.name: GUANETHIDINE
entities.description: Guanethidine is a compound used to treat hypertension, with various side effects including abdominal distension and anaphylactic shock.

entities.name: ISRADIPINE
entities.description: Isradipine is a calcium channel antagonist used to treat hypertension, associated with side effects such as anxiety and atrial fibrillation.

entities.name: ABDOMINAL DISTENSION
entities.description: Abdominal distension is a side effect associated with the use of Guanethidine in treating hypertension.

entities.name: ABDOMINAL PAIN
entities.description: Abdominal pain is a side effect associated with the use of Guanethidine in treating hypertension.

entities.name: AGRANULOCYTOSIS
entities.description: Agranulocytosis is a serious side effect that can occur with the use of certain medications, including Guanethidine.

entities.name: ANAPHYLACTIC SHOCK
entities.description: Anaphylactic shock is a severe allergic reaction that can be a side effect of both Guanethidine and Isradipine.

entities.name: ANAEMIA
entities.description: Anaemia is a side effect that can occur with the use of both Guanethidine and Isradipine.

entities.name: APLASTIC ANAEMIA
entities.description: Aplastic anaemia is a rare but serious side effect associated with the use of Guanethidine.

entities.name: HAEMOLYTIC ANAEMIA
entities.description: Haemolytic anaemia is a potential side effect of Guanethidine treatment.

entities.name: ANGINA PECTORIS
entities.description: Angina pectoris is a side effect that can occur with the use of both Guanethidine and Isradipine.

entities.name: ANGIOEDEMA
entities.description: Angioedema is a side effect associated with both Guanethidine and Isradipine.

entities.name: ANOREXIA

entities.name: ANXIETY

entities.name: ARTHRALGIA
entities.description: Arthralgia is a side effect that can occur with the use of Isradipine.

entities.name: ASTHENIA

entities.name: ATRIAL FIBRILLATION
entities.description: Atrial fibrillation is a potential side effect of Isradipine treatment.

entities.name: BACK PAIN
entities.description: Back pain is a side effect that can occur with the use of Isradipine.

entities.description: Mental disorder is a side effect associated with the use of Isradipine.

chunk:
[Nicotine Dependence] is the name of a kind of disease.
[Nicotine Dependence] presents the symptom [Amblyopia].
[Nicotine Dependence] presents the symptom [Body Weight].
[Nicotine Dependence] presents the symptom [Fetal Hypoxia].
[Nicotine Dependence] presents the symptom [Hyperalgesia].
[Nicotine Dependence] presents the symptom [Sleep Initiation And Maintenance Disorders].
[Nicotine Dependence] presents the symptom [Psychomotor Agitation].
[Nicotine Dependence] presents the symptom [Sleep Disorders].
[Nicotine Dependence] presents the symptom [Weight Gain].
[Nicotine Dependence] presents the symptom [Pain Threshold].
[Nicotine Dependence] presents the symptom [Postoperative Nausea And Vomiting].
[Nicotine Dependence] localizes at the [Brain] of human body.
[Nicotine Dependence] localizes at the [Saliva] of human body.
[Nicotine Dependence] localizes at the [Midbrain] of human body.
[Nicotine Dependence] localizes at the [Cardiovascular System] of human body.

The following content describes information about compounds that can palliate or treat the disease named Nicotine Dependence.The format of each compound's information is as follows:
Compound name: ***
Pharmacologic class: ***
Effect on Nicotine Dependence: Palliate or Treat
Side effect: ***
These respectively represent the name of the compound, the pharmacologic class it belongs to, its positive effect on the disease named Nicotine Dependence (palliates or treats) and its side effects.

Compound name: Nicotine
Pharmacologic class: Nicotine
Effect on Nicotine Dependence: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Amnesia, Anaphylactic shock, Angioedema, Anxiety, Aphasia, Arrhythmia, Arthralgia, Arthritis, Asthenia

Compound name: Varenicline
Pharmacologic class: Partial Cholinergic Nicotinic Agonists
Effect on Nicotine Dependence: Treat
Side effect: Abdominal distension, Abdominal pain, Pancreatitis acute, Aggression, Amnesia, Anaemia, Anger, Angina pectoris, Angioedema, Anorexia

entities.name: NICOTINE DEPENDENCE
entities.description: Nicotine Dependence is a disease characterized by various symptoms and localizations in the human body, including the brain and cardiovascular system.

entities.name: AMBLYOPIA
entities.description: Amblyopia is a symptom associated with Nicotine Dependence, affecting vision.

entities.name: BODY WEIGHT
entities.description: Body Weight is a symptom that can be influenced by Nicotine Dependence.

entities.name: FETAL HYPOXIA
entities.description: Fetal Hypoxia is a symptom related to Nicotine Dependence, affecting fetal health.

entities.name: HYPERALGESIA
entities.description: Hyperalgesia is a symptom of increased pain sensitivity associated with Nicotine Dependence.

entities.name: SLEEP INITIATION AND MAINTENANCE DISORDERS
entities.description: Sleep Initiation and Maintenance Disorders are symptoms that can occur due to Nicotine Dependence.

entities.name: PSYCHOMOTOR AGITATION
entities.description: Psychomotor Agitation is a symptom that may be present in individuals with Nicotine Dependence.

entities.name: SLEEP DISORDERS
entities.description: Sleep Disorders are symptoms that can be linked to Nicotine Dependence.

entities.name: WEIGHT GAIN
entities.description: Weight Gain is a symptom that can be associated with Nicotine Dependence.

entities.name: PAIN THRESHOLD
entities.description: Pain Threshold is a symptom that can be affected by Nicotine Dependence.

entities.name: POSTOPERATIVE NAUSEA AND VOMITING
entities.description: Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting is a symptom that may occur in relation to Nicotine Dependence.

entities.name: BRAIN
entities.description: The Brain is one of the localizations of Nicotine Dependence in the human body.

entities.name: SALIVA
entities.description: Saliva is another localization of Nicotine Dependence in the human body.

entities.name: MIDBRAIN
entities.description: The Midbrain is a specific area in the brain where Nicotine Dependence localizes.

entities.name: CARDIOVASCULAR SYSTEM
entities.description: The Cardiovascular System is a localization of Nicotine Dependence in the human body.

entities.name: NICOTINE
entities.description: Nicotine is a compound that can palliate Nicotine Dependence, but has various side effects.

entities.name: VARENICLINE
entities.description: Varenicline is a partial cholinergic nicotinic agonist that treats Nicotine Dependence and has its own side effects.

entities.name: AMNESIA
entities.description: Amnesia is a side effect associated with the compound Nicotine.

entities.name: ANAPHYLACTIC SHOCK
entities.description: Anaphylactic Shock is a severe side effect associated with the compound Nicotine.

entities.name: ANGIOEDEMA
entities.description: Angioedema is a side effect associated with the compound Nicotine.

entities.name: ANXIETY
entities.description: Anxiety is a side effect associated with the compound Nicotine.

entities.name: APHASIA
entities.description: Aphasia is a side effect associated with the compound Nicotine.

entities.name: ARRHYTHMIA
entities.description: Arrhythmia is a side effect associated with the compound Nicotine.

entities.name: ARTHRALGIA
entities.description: Arthralgia is a side effect associated with the compound Nicotine.

entities.name: ARTHRITIS
entities.description: Arthritis is a side effect associated with the compound Nicotine.

entities.name: ASTHENIA
entities.description: Asthenia is a side effect associated with the compound Nicotine.

entities.name: ABDOMINAL DISTENSION
entities.description: Abdominal Distension is a side effect associated with the compound Varenicline.

entities.name: PANCREATITIS ACUTE
entities.description: Acute Pancreatitis is a side effect associated with the compound Varenicline.

entities.name: AGGRESSION
entities.description: Aggression is a side effect associated with the compound Varenicline.

entities.name: ANAEMIA
entities.description: Anaemia is a side effect associated with the compound Varenicline.

entities.name: ANGER
entities.description: Anger is a side effect associated with the compound Varenicline.

entities.description: Angina Pectoris is a side effect associated with the compound Varenicline.

entities.description: Anorexia is a side effect associated with the compound Varenicline.

[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] is the name of a kind of disease.
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] presents the symptom [Agraphia].
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] presents the symptom [Alcohol Amnestic Disorder].
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] presents the symptom [Amnesia].
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] presents the symptom [Amnesia, Retrograde].
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] presents the symptom [Olfaction Disorders].
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] presents the symptom [Aphasia].
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] presents the symptom [Apraxias].
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] presents the symptom [Articulation Disorders].
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] presents the symptom [Auditory Perceptual Disorders].
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] presents the symptom [Blindness].
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] localizes at the [Cranial Nerve Ii] of human body.
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] localizes at the [Brain] of human body.
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] localizes at the [Optic Chiasma] of human body.
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] localizes at the [Pons] of human body.
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] localizes at the [Nervous System] of human body.
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] localizes at the [Central Nervous System] of human body.
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] localizes at the [Strand Of Hair] of human body.
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] localizes at the [External Carotid Artery] of human body.
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] localizes at the [Radial Artery] of human body.
[Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder] localizes at the [Face] of human body.

The following content describes information about compounds that can palliate or treat the disease named Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.The format of each compound's information is as follows:
Compound name: ***
Pharmacologic class: ***
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate or Treat
Side effect: ***
These respectively represent the name of the compound, the pharmacologic class it belongs to, its positive effect on the disease named Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (palliates or treats) and its side effects.

Compound name: Lisdexamfetamine
Pharmacologic class: Central Nervous System Stimulation
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Aggression, Anaphylactic shock, Angioedema, Anorexia, Anxiety, Asthenia, Mental disorder, Bruxism, Constipation, Sudden death

Compound name: Nortriptyline
Pharmacologic class: None
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal cramps, Abdominal pain, Adenitis, Agranulocytosis, Alopecia, Aplastic anaemia, Anorexia, Anxiety, Arrhythmia, Asthenia

Compound name: Bupropion
Pharmacologic class: Norepinephrine Uptake Inhibitors
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal distension, Abdominal pain, Aggression, Alopecia, Amblyopia, Amenorrhoea, Amnesia, Anaphylactic shock, Anaemia, Anger

Compound name: Imipramine
Pharmacologic class: None
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal cramps, Abdominal pain, Adenitis, Aggression, Agranulocytosis, Alopecia, Alveolitis allergic, Anaphylactic shock, Anorexia, Anxiety

Compound name: Atomoxetine
Pharmacologic class: Norepinephrine Uptake Inhibitors
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Aggression, Anorexia, Anxiety, Arthralgia, Asthenia, Back pain, Mental disorder, Bone disorder, Breast disorder

Compound name: Methylphenidate
Pharmacologic class: Central Nervous System Stimulation
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Abscess, Aggression, Albuminuria, Alopecia, Anaphylactic shock, Anaemia, Aplastic anaemia, Anger, Angina pectoris

Compound name: Guanfacine
Pharmacologic class: Adrenergic alpha2-Agonists
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Alopecia, Amnesia, Anxiety, Sinus arrhythmia, Arthralgia, Asthenia, Asthma, Atrioventricular block, Chest pain

Compound name: Clonidine
Pharmacologic class: Adrenergic alpha2-Agonists
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Aggression, Alopecia, Angioedema, Anorexia, Anxiety, Arrhythmia, Arthralgia, Asthenia, Asthma

Compound name: Venlafaxine
Pharmacologic class: Norepinephrine Uptake Inhibitors
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal distension, Abdominal pain, Congenital anomaly, Adjustment disorder, Aggression, Agranulocytosis, Albuminuria, Alopecia,

entities.name: ATTENTION DEFICIT HYPERACTIVITY DISORDER
entities.description: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder is a disease characterized by symptoms such as Agraphia, Amnesia, and various other cognitive and behavioral issues.

entities.name: LISDEXAMFETAMINE
entities.description: Lisdexamfetamine is a compound classified as a Central Nervous System Stimulation that can palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: NORTRIPTYLINE
entities.description: Nortriptyline is a compound that has no specific pharmacologic class and can palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: BUPROPION
entities.description: Bupropion is a Norepinephrine Uptake Inhibitor that can palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: IMIPRAMINE
entities.description: Imipramine is a compound with no specific pharmacologic class that can palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: ATOMOXETINE
entities.description: Atomoxetine is a Norepinephrine Uptake Inhibitor that can palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: METHYLPHENIDATE
entities.description: Methylphenidate is a Central Nervous System Stimulation compound that can palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: GUANFACINE
entities.description: Guanfacine is an Adrenergic alpha2-Agonist that can palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: CLONIDINE
entities.description: Clonidine is an Adrenergic alpha2-Agonist that can palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: VENLAFAXINE
entities.description: Venlafaxine is a Norepinephrine Uptake Inhibitor that can palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: ALCOHOL AMNESTIC DISORDER
entities.description: Alcohol Amnestic Disorder is a symptom that can occur in individuals with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, leading to memory issues related to alcohol consumption.

entities.name: AMNESIA
entities.description: Amnesia is a symptom that can manifest in individuals with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, affecting their memory.

entities.name: AMNESIA, RETROGRADE
entities.description: Retrograde Amnesia is a specific type of amnesia that can be a symptom of Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, where individuals lose memories of events that occurred before the onset of the disorder.

entities.name: OLFACTION DISORDERS
entities.description: Olfaction Disorders are symptoms that can be associated with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, affecting the sense of smell.

entities.name: APHASIA
entities.description: Aphasia is a symptom that can occur in individuals with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, impacting their ability to communicate effectively.

entities.name: APRAXIAS
entities.description: Apraxias are symptoms related to Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, characterized by difficulty in performing tasks or movements when asked.

entities.name: ARTICULATION DISORDERS
entities.description: Articulation Disorders are symptoms that can be associated with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, affecting speech clarity.

entities.name: AUDITORY PERCEPTUAL DISORDERS
entities.description: Auditory Perceptual Disorders are symptoms that can occur in individuals with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, impacting their ability to process auditory information.

entities.name: BLINDNESS
entities.description: Blindness can be a symptom associated with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, affecting visual perception.

entities.name: CRANIAL NERVE II
entities.description: Cranial Nerve II is a part of the human nervous system that can be localized in relation to Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: BRAIN
entities.description: The brain is a central organ in the human body that can be affected by Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: OPTIC CHIASMA
entities.description: The optic chiasma is a structure in the brain that can be localized in relation to Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: PONS
entities.description: The pons is a part of the brainstem that can be localized in relation to Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: NERVOUS SYSTEM
entities.description: The nervous system is a complex network that can be affected by Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.name: CENTRAL NERVOUS SYSTEM
entities.description: The central nervous system is a key area that can be impacted by Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

entities.description: The strand of hair is a part of the human body that can be localized in relation to Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

chunk:
, Anorexia, Anxiety, Arrhythmia, Arthralgia, Asthenia, Asthma

Compound name: Venlafaxine
Pharmacologic class: Norepinephrine Uptake Inhibitors
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal distension, Abdominal pain, Congenital anomaly, Adjustment disorder, Aggression, Agranulocytosis, Albuminuria, Alopecia, Amenorrhoea, Amnesia

Compound name: Modafinil
Pharmacologic class: Increased Sympathetic Activity
Effect on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Palliate
Side effect: Abdominal pain, Aggression, Agranulocytosis, Albuminuria, Amblyopia, Amnesia, Anaphylactic shock, Anaemia, Angioedema, Anorexia

entities.name: VENLAFAXINE
entities.description: Venlafaxine is a compound classified as a Norepinephrine Uptake Inhibitor, used to palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder and associated with various side effects.

entities.name: MODAFINIL
entities.description: Modafinil is a compound that increases sympathetic activity, used to palliate Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder and has several side effects.

entities.name: ANXIETY
entities.description: Anxiety is a mental health condition marked by feelings of worry, fear, or apprehension, often affecting daily activities.

entities.name: ARRHYTHMIA
entities.description: Arrhythmia refers to an irregular heartbeat, which can lead to various health complications and requires medical attention.

entities.name: ARTHRALGIA
entities.description: Arthralgia is the medical term for joint pain, which can result from various conditions and injuries.

entities.name: ASTHENIA
entities.description: Asthenia is a condition characterized by a lack of energy and strength, often associated with various medical conditions.

entities.name: ASTHMA
entities.description: Asthma is a chronic respiratory condition that causes difficulty in breathing due to inflammation and narrowing of the airways.

entities.name: ABDOMINAL DISTENSION
entities.description: Abdominal distension is a condition where the abdomen feels full and tight, often due to gas or fluid accumulation.

entities.name: ABDOMINAL PAIN
entities.description: Abdominal pain refers to discomfort or pain in the stomach area, which can arise from various medical issues.

entities.name: CONGENITAL ANOMALY
entities.description: Congenital anomaly refers to a medical condition that is present at birth, which can affect various body parts and functions.

entities.name: ADJUSTMENT DISORDER
entities.description: Adjustment disorder is a mental health condition that occurs when an individual has difficulty coping with a significant life change or stressor.

entities.name: AGGRESSION
entities.description: Aggression is a behavior characterized by hostile or violent actions or attitudes towards others.

entities.name: AGRANULOCYTOSIS
entities.description: Agranulocytosis is a serious condition involving a dangerously low level of neutrophils, increasing the risk of infections.

entities.name: ALBUMINURIA
entities.description: Albuminuria is the presence of albumin in the urine, often indicating kidney disease or damage.

entities.name: ALOPECIA
entities.description: Alopecia is a condition that causes hair loss, which can occur in patches or affect the entire scalp.

entities.name: AMENORRHOEA
entities.description: Amenorrhoea is the absence of menstruation, which can be caused by various factors including stress, pregnancy, or health conditions.

entities.name: AMNESIA
entities.description: Amnesia is a condition characterized by memory loss, which can be temporary or permanent, often due to injury or psychological factors.

entities.name: AMBLYOPIA
entities.description: Amblyopia, also known as lazy eye, is a vision development disorder where an eye fails to achieve normal visual acuity.

entities.name: ANAPHYLACTIC SHOCK
entities.description: Anaphylactic shock is a severe, potentially life-threatening allergic reaction that requires immediate medical attention.

entities.name: ANAEMIA
entities.description: Anaemia is a condition characterized by a deficiency of red blood cells or hemoglobin in the blood, leading to fatigue and weakness.

entities.name: ANGIOEDEMA
entities.description:
Angioedema is a condition involving swelling of the deeper layers of the skin, often related to allergic reactions.
Angioedema is a condition involving swelling of the deeper layers of the skin, often related to allergic reactions.)<|COMPLETE|>

entities.name: ANOREXIA
entities.description: Anorexia is an eating disorder characterized by an intense fear of gaining weight and a distorted body image, leading to restricted food intake.
